title: Discord Onboarding Flow
description: A comprehensive onboarding flow featuring a welcoming splash screen, phone/email authentication options, and an intuitive numeric keypad for verification. Dark mode design with purple accent colors.

title: Analytics Dashboard Overview
description: Modern analytics dashboard with comprehensive data visualization including line charts, bar graphs, and key metrics cards. Features real-time data updates and interactive filtering.

title: Multi-Step Checkout Flow
description: Streamlined multi-step checkout process with cart review, shipping details, and payment information. Includes form validation, progress indicators, and order summary.

title: Social Media Feed Layout
description: Engaging social media feed with card-based layout, image galleries, like/comment interactions, and infinite scroll. Optimized for mobile viewing.

title: User Settings & Profile
description: Comprehensive settings interface with tabbed navigation, profile customization, notification preferences, and security options. Clean, organized layout with clear visual hierarchy.

title: Advanced Search Results
description: Powerful search results interface with sidebar filters, sorting options, and grid/list view toggles. Features faceted search and real-time result updates.

title: Real-time Chat Interface
description: Modern messaging interface with conversation list, threaded messages, typing indicators, and rich media support. Includes emoji picker and file attachments.

title: Calendar & Event Scheduling
description: Full-featured calendar application with multiple view modes (month, week, day), event creation, drag-and-drop scheduling, and recurring event support.

title: Pricing Plans Comparison
description: Elegant pricing table with tier comparison, feature lists, and billing toggle. Highlights recommended plan and includes clear call-to-action buttons.

title: Cloud File Manager
description: Comprehensive file management interface with folder navigation, drag-and-drop upload, file preview, and batch operations. Includes storage usage visualization.

title: Notification Center
description: Centralized notification system with categorized alerts, read/unread states, action buttons, and notification preferences. Supports real-time updates.

title: Multi-Step Form Wizard
description: User-friendly multi-step form with progress indicator, field validation, step navigation, and summary review. Saves progress and allows editing previous steps.
